title: AI Innovation Challenge 2025
description: Build innovative AI solutions that solve real-world problems. Focus areas include healthcare, education, climate change, and sustainable development. Participants will have access to mentors from leading tech companies and AI research labs.
eligibility: Open to all developers and students worldwide
organizedBy: TechVentures Global in partnership with AI Research Foundation

title: Web3 DeFi Hackathon
description: Create decentralized finance applications using blockchain technology. Build smart contracts, DApps, and explore the future of finance with Web3 technologies including Ethereum, Solana, and Polygon.

title: Green Tech Solutions Hackathon
description: Develop technology solutions to combat climate change and promote sustainability. Categories include renewable energy, waste management, carbon tracking, and sustainable agriculture. Join us in building a greener future.
eligibility: Open to all, students get priority registration

title: HealthTech Innovation Sprint
description: Transform healthcare with innovative digital solutions. Build apps, platforms, or tools for telemedicine, patient care, mental health, fitness tracking, or healthcare data management. Expert medical professionals will be available for consultation.

title: Gaming & XR Experience Jam
description: Create immersive gaming experiences using VR, AR, or traditional gaming platforms. Whether you're into indie games, AAA-style shooters, puzzle games, or metaverse experiences - bring your creativity to life in 48 hours.
eligibility: Open to all game developers and designers

title: Fintech Revolution Hackathon
description: Revolutionize the financial industry with cutting-edge fintech solutions. Build payment systems, banking apps, investment platforms, fraud detection systems, or personal finance management tools.

title: EdTech Learning Platform Challenge
description: Design and develop innovative educational technology solutions. Create learning management systems, interactive course platforms, AI tutors, or gamified learning experiences for students of all ages.
eligibility: Open to all, educators welcome to join tech teams

title: Cybersecurity Defense Hackathon
description: Build robust security solutions to protect against cyber threats. Develop tools for threat detection, vulnerability scanning, secure authentication, or create innovative approaches to data protection and privacy.
eligibility: Cybersecurity professionals and computer science students

title: Smart City IoT Challenge
description: Leverage IoT technology to create smarter, more efficient cities. Develop solutions for traffic management, energy optimization, waste collection, public safety, or smart infrastructure monitoring.
eligibility: Open to all, urban planners encouraged to participate
organizedBy: Urban Innovation Labs & Smart City Council

title: Social Impact Hackathon
description: Use technology to create positive social impact. Address challenges in areas like poverty alleviation, accessibility, disaster relief, community building, or empowering underserved populations.
